On the other hand, having it as a step or a layer will make the whole model look linear, straightforward and elegant. So, anyone who wants to keep his code clean and beautiful will spend some time to google and to copy\paste something similar to what @vabh have put.

body:
Honestly, the motivation is not clear to me. Making transformation in `forward` function will break the model into pieces and will make code little bit more messy.
On the other hand, having it as a step or a layer will make the whole model look linear, straightforward and elegant. So, anyone who wants to keep his code clean and beautiful will spend some time to google and to copy\paste something similar to what @vabh have put.
